thread.title: BRIEF-Kenon Holdings Ltd Says Not Considering Sale Of Its Ownership Interest In OPC

title: BRIEF-Kenon Holdings Ltd Says Not Considering Sale Of Its Ownership Interest In OPC
text:
March 30, 2018 / 3:49 PM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Kenon Holdings Ltd Says Not Considering Sale Of Its Ownership Interest In OPC Reuters Staff 
March 30 (Reuters) - Kenon Holdings Ltd: 
* KENON HOLDINGS LTD - PROVIDES UPDATES WITH RESPECT TO ITS INTEREST IN OPC - SEC FILING 
* KENON HOLDINGS-CONSIDERING VARIOUS OPTIONS TO ADDRESS LETTER FROM ISRAEL CONCENTRATION COMMITTEE, BUT NO SALE, IN FULL OR PART, OF OPC BEING CONSIDERED 
* KENON HOLDINGS - ISSUED PRESS RELEASE TO CORRECT "INACCURATE RELEASE THAT WAS INCORRECTLY ISSUED EARLIER TODAY" Source text - ( bit.ly/2IddoLy ) Further company coverage:
